segments.text: Hello , I've got a letter here that I'd like to post .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the letter is going to a friend of mine in America and it's quite urgent . It really needs to be posted today , so here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to send it airmail , madam ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do want to send it airmail , yes .
segments.speaker: S1
